from ase import Atoms
from ase.calculators.crystal import CRYSTAL
from ase.optimize import BFGS
from pydantic import BaseModel

from annotations.models.CrystalParameters import CrystalParameters
from annotations.models.StructureMetadata import StructureMetadata

# Functions Code



def structure_generation_999b5fa85601fc9a3b1bd59e382b9758c4172c17(
    parameters: StructureMetadata,
) -> Atoms:
    pass


def crystal14_geometric_relaxation(
    atoms: Atoms, parameters: CrystalParameters
) -> Atoms:
    crystal_keys = [
        "restart",
        "xc",
        "spinpol",
        "guess",
        "basis",
        "kpts",
        "isp",
        "smearing",
    ]
    parameter_dict = {
        k: v for k, v in parameters.dict(exclude_none=True).items() if k in crystal_keys
    }
    calc = CRYSTAL(**parameter_dict)
    atoms.set_calculator(calc)
    dyn = BFGS(atoms)
    dyn.run(parameters.fmax)
    return atoms


# Inputs Code



class CrystalParameters(BaseModel):
    version: bool | None = None
    restart: bool | None = None
    xc: str | None = None
    spinpol: bool | None = None
    guess: bool | None = None
    basis: str | None = None
    kpts: str | list[int] | None = None
    isp: int | None = None
    smearing: float | None = None
    fmax: float | None = 1e-5

    class Config:
        extra = "allow"



class StructureMetadata(BaseModel):
    id: str | None = None
    name: str | None = None
    type: str | None = None
    composition: str | None = None
    description: str | None = None
    vacuum_x: float | None = None
    vacuum_y: float | None = None
    vacuum_z: float | None = None
    supercell: str | None = None
    cas_number: str | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None
    lattice_a: float | None = None
    lattice_b: float | None = None
    lattice_c: float | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None
    mp_id: str | None = None

structure_metadata_Rb_citrate = StructureMetadata.parse_raw('{"name": "dirubidium hydrogen citrate", "type": "molecular", "composition": "Rb2C6H6O7", "description": "crystal lattice", "vacuum_x": NaN, "vacuum_y": NaN, "vacuum_z": NaN, "supercell": "1x1x1", "cas_number": NaN, "lattice_a": 5.97796, "lattice_b": 15.096, "lattice_c": 5.32067, "space group": "P2_1/m", "orientation": NaN, "mp_id": NaN}')

crystal14_parameters_3 = CrystalParameters.parse_raw('{"version": 14, "restart": NaN, "xc": "B3LYP", "spinpol": NaN, "guess": NaN, "basis": "POB-TZVP ", "kpts": "[8,8,8]", "isp": NaN, "smearing": NaN, "tolinteg": NaN, "toldee": NaN, "fmax": NaN, "Rb_basis": "3s3p"}')

# Execution Code

Rb_citrate = structure_generation_999b5fa85601fc9a3b1bd59e382b9758c4172c17(structure_metadata_Rb_citrate)
relaxed_structure = crystal14_geometric_relaxation(Rb_citrate, crystal14_parameters_3)

from ase import Atoms
from ase.calculators.crystal import CRYSTAL
from ase.optimize import BFGS
from pydantic import BaseModel

from annotations.models.CrystalParameters import CrystalParameters
from annotations.models.StructureMetadata import StructureMetadata

# Functions Code



def crystal14_geometric_relaxation(
    atoms: Atoms, parameters: CrystalParameters
) -> Atoms:
    crystal_keys = [
        "restart",
        "xc",
        "spinpol",
        "guess",
        "basis",
        "kpts",
        "isp",
        "smearing",
    ]
    parameter_dict = {
        k: v for k, v in parameters.dict(exclude_none=True).items() if k in crystal_keys
    }
    calc = CRYSTAL(**parameter_dict)
    atoms.set_calculator(calc)
    dyn = BFGS(atoms)
    dyn.run(parameters.fmax)
    return atoms


def structure_generation_999b5fa85601fc9a3b1bd59e382b9758c4172c17(
    parameters: StructureMetadata,
) -> Atoms:
    pass


# Inputs Code



class StructureMetadata(BaseModel):
    id: str | None = None
    name: str | None = None
    type: str | None = None
    composition: str | None = None
    description: str | None = None
    vacuum_x: float | None = None
    vacuum_y: float | None = None
    vacuum_z: float | None = None
    supercell: str | None = None
    cas_number: str | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None
    lattice_a: float | None = None
    lattice_b: float | None = None
    lattice_c: float | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None

structure_metadata_Rb_citrate = StructureMetadata.parse_raw('{"name": "dirubidium hydrogen citrate", "type": "molecular", "composition": "Rb2C6H6O7", "description": "crystal lattice", "vacuum_x": NaN, "vacuum_y": NaN, "vacuum_z": NaN, "supercell": "1x1x1", "cas_number": NaN, "lattice_a": 5.97796, "lattice_b": 15.096, "lattice_c": 5.32067, "space group": "P2_1/m", "orientation": NaN, "mp_id": NaN}')
